translations: 横支杆，播撒机；[建]撒布机，分离器（spreader 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Open the ladder fully and lock the spreaders in place.
sentences.translation: 把梯子完全打开，锁住插销。

sentences.sentence: To lead the design of new spreaders and related products.
sentences.translation: 带领部门团队设计公司吊具和相关产品；

sentences.sentence: None of this is particularly surprising, except perhaps to some of the meme-spreaders.
sentences.translation: 这些情况其实不足为奇，可能只会让一些“迷因”传播者大跌眼镜。
